Header.title: DEXTRAORDINARY FARM
Header.paragraph: Where Clucks of Quality Meet Eggs-traordinary Delight!

About.paragraph: We believe that the quality of life for our poultry reflects the quality on your plate. Our birds enjoy a diverse, organic diet, filled with locally sourced grains and lush, pesticide-free vegetation. With Dextraordinary Farm, you're not just supporting a poultry farm, but joining a community of conscious consumers who value sustainability and animal welfare. Each purchase supports our mission to provide an idyllic haven for poultry and inspires a future where responsible farming practices are the norm. Come, experience the taste of genuine farm-to-table goodness. Discover Feather Haven, where passion, integrity, and the finest poultry products come together harmoniously, enriching your meals and your conscience.

Services.name: Hatchery Services
Services.text: We operate excellent hatcheries, offering hatching services for eggs. This can be beneficial for individuals or businesses looking to start their own flock or expand their existing poultry operations.

Services.name: Poultry Products
Services.text: We offer the sale of poultry products, including whole chickens, chicken parts (such as breasts, thighs, drumsticks), eggs, and processed poultry products such as sausages or ready-to-cook items

Services.name: Gift Delivery and Shipping
Services.text: For your convenience, our farm offers delivery services to customers anywhere within Nigeria, saving you the burden of carrying chicken for your village people. We ensure your selections reach you or your friends in a timely and fresh manner.

Services.name: Farm Visit and Tours
Services.text: We also provide farm visitation or guided tours, allowing individuals, educational institutions, or groups to explore and learn about poultry farming practices. This service offers a hands-on experience and educates visitors about the farm's operations, animal welfare practices, and sustainable farming methods.

Services.name: Consulting and Advice
Services.text: Our farm shares its extensive experience and expertise through consulting services to aspiring farmers or individuals looking to start their own poultry operations. This includes guidance on farm setup, breed selection, nutrition, disease management, and general best practices.

Services.name: Health and Educational Outreach
Services.text: To ensure the well-being of the poultry, we provide flock health monitoring services, including regular workshops, check-ups, disease prevention measures, and vaccination programs. This helps spread knowledge and maintain a healthy and disease-free flock.

Testimonials.text: "Dextraordinary Farm has truly redefined quality poultry products. The chickens are incredibly flavorful, and the eggs are always fresh and delicious. I can trust that Ifeoma's commitment to excellence and ethical farming practices ensures that I am getting the best poultry for my family."
Testimonials.name: Adaobi Okonkwo

Testimonials.text: "These are true professionals. The chickens I purchased here were of exceptional quality, and the customer service was top-notch. Their knowledge and passion for poultry farming shine through in every aspect of their operations. I highly recommend their poultry!"
Testimonials.name: Tunde Adepoju

Testimonials.text: "The eggs are always fresh and full of flavor. The attention to detail and commitment to organic farming practices make all the difference. I'm a loyal customer and wouldn't go anywhere else for my poultry needs"
Testimonials.name: Funmilayo Ojo

Testimonials.text: "Dextraordinary Farm is my go-to source for high-quality poultry. The chickens are tender and juicy, and the variety of cuts available is impressive. Its dedication to sustainable farming and their warm customer service made the experience truly exceptional."
Testimonials.name: Emeka Nwosu

Testimonials.text: "This is a testament to excellence. The poultry products are of unmatched quality, and Ngozi's expertise in economics shines through in her efficient farming practices. Dextraordinary Farm is a prime example of how entrepreneurship and agriculture can go hand in hand."
Testimonials.name: Douglas Chindah

Testimonials.text: "This poultry Farm offers poultry products that are second to none. The flavor and texture of the meat are outstanding, the chickens are raised with care and the customers are treated with respect. They even exhibited concern for my [islamic] dietary practices"
Testimonials.name: Ibrahim Mohammed

Contact.address: 8 Paradise St, Atali Farm Estate, Port Harcourt, RS 500101
